Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Lil Nas X was not actually dropped from his Wrangler endorsement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake news article from a satirical website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Lil Nas X was dropped from his Wrangler endorsement after coming out as gay, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that Lil Nas X's endorsement with Wrangler was still in effect and the rumors of him being dropped were false.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Lil Nas X was dropped from his endorsement, when in fact he was not.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times as it is consistently false.
No biases: The claim does not have any biases towards a particular group or viewpoint.
